758.quoteText: The policy may be updated from time to time at our discretion. Changes will be effective upon posting to the site.
758.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
tosdr.tldr: The policy may be updated from time to time at their discretion. Changes will be effective upon posting to the site.

996.quoteText:
Intuit may make anonymous or aggregate personal information and disclose such data only in a non-personally identifiable manner to:

  • Advertisers and other third parties for their marketing and promotional purposes, such as the number of users who applied for a credit card or how many users clicked on a particular Intuit Offer;
  • Organizations approved by Intuit that conduct research into consumer spending. and
  • Users of the Service for purposes of comparison of their personal financial situation relative to the broader community.

Such information does not identify you individually.
996.title: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Only aggregate data is given to third parties
